column2: BRIEF-Newpark Resources Announces New Chairman May 21 (Reuters) - Newpark Resources Inc: * ANTHONY J. BEST HAS BEEN NAMED CHAIRMAN OF BOARD EFFECTIVE MAY 17, 2018, SUCCEEDING DAVID C. ANDERSON Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Newpark Resources Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.08 From Continuing Operations April 26 (Reuters) - Newpark Resources Inc: * Q1 REVENUE $227.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $222.6 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
